column4: Anyone know about using Gnome3 for Ubuntu? (not looking forward to Unity desktop after f15a) Should I look to Debian instead?
most likely the gnome packages will still be around so you can just install them yourself

thanks I'm thinking of coming back to Ubuntu after some adventures (I want my computer to work for me, not the other way around) but I've been using Fedora 15 alpha (with Gnome3) and it's sublime. I'm scared to downgrade!!
just make sure it's got gnome3 before you decide if that's your killer feature
